extendedInfo.description: Set sail on a whimsical journey, and celebrate scenes from all around the globe in the âitâs a small worldâ live wallpaper app!Enter this delightful world filled with vibrant settings, and meet fantastical friends along the way. Travel through the Snowy Alps, dusty plains, calm seas, and more as you tour different regions around the world. From beloved Disney characters to toy soldiers and mermaids, encounter new and familiar faces throughout your travels. With so much to see, start your joyful journey today!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I have a samsung galaxy note 2. This wallpaper is gorgeous and at a killer price! The reason why it don\'t work for some is because the default samsung home manager does not support screen scrolling. I use Nova. There are plenty more out there which also support screen scrolling.
reviews.author: Peixuan Pey

reviews.title: Did my 3rd grader make this?
reviews.comment: So used of Disney bringing great apps but this one doesn\'t have settings or even the chance to change the screens/scroll like the pictures/description says. Tried on my Samsung Galaxy Note 2 and Galaxy S 2 and they both don\'t work. Fix asap.
reviews.author: Marko Kesich

reviews.title: Works fine on Nexus 4
reviews.comment: ...with Nova Launcher *BUT* it\'s a HUGE battery drainer! Imagine something like having Candy Crush running all the time - don\'t be surprised if your battery depletes by up to 20% an hour!! I\'ve bought half a dozen live wallpapers and have tested tens of them, and this one is not up to scratch in terms of battery consumption...
reviews.author: Kevin Chan

reviews.title: Very bad
reviews.comment: Only 1/3 of the top shows and there is no potrait mode. The screen is stationery all the time too so it\'s always the sun part. No settings either. I really like this design so I\'m hoping for it to work but sadly no. Please allow me to refund, thanks.  Samsung galaxy note 10.1 lte
reviews.author: Siren Yee

reviews.title: Nice looking but not suitable
reviews.comment: This live wallpaper has no settings and it doesn\'t seem to react to the user interaction. Maybe it moves according to the time of day, I don\'t know as I only tried it for a short while. I find it a bit too \'busy\' to have it as the background of my home screen, the icons get lost in it.  Nice looking but doesn\'t work well as a live wallpaper.
reviews.author: Miguel Costa

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: It works great on my Galaxy Nexus and adds some cheer to my phone.  Thanks!!
reviews.author: Sharon Pickett

reviews.title: Love to see more android support.
reviews.comment: Love to see more android support from Disney!  You didn\'t quite get marry Blair\'s color palette down. But I still love the app thank you
reviews.author: Bailey Neff

reviews.title: So good
reviews.comment: Its good  pero ayaw lumabas sa scren
reviews.author: roel toledo

reviews.title: Fun but...
reviews.comment: On my galaxy nexus: works great. just ridiculously  hard to see any of my desktop icons. Which is kinda crucial if you think about it.  On my galaxy tab 10.1 running CM 10 nightly: glitchy, only works in horizontal mode, can\'t even see half of the wallpaper. Pixel glitches happen constantly, not smooth either. Beautiful design and very interactive though
reviews.author: Okan Arabacioglu

reviews.title: Problem with 4.1.1
reviews.comment: Phone : Samsung Galaxy Note 2 7100 System : android 4.1.1 Problem : only central graphic is showing,  will not allow to see other four illustrations,  please kindly fix Comment : beautiful and cute illustration to look at,  one of the best paid live wallpaper,  but please amend problem stated above
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Busy...but fun.
reviews.comment: Super busy, but pretty fun to have! Can\'t comment on battery life just yet...
reviews.author: Adam Bullock

reviews.title: It\'s broken :(
reviews.comment: The wallpaper won\'t scroll. At first, I thought it was going to change based on the weather, but that\'s not happening. The pictures line up with each other in a way that makes it look like they should scroll when flipping between screens, but they don\'t. The animations on the one screen I can view are cute though, so I\'ll add a star for that. ^-^
reviews.author: John Kavadas

reviews.title: Crowded
reviews.comment: So colourful you can\'t see your buttons, great maybe for those who don\'t really have apps on the main screens. It\'s got no settings and from what I can see it\'s samey all the way through x
reviews.author: Stuart Benton

reviews.title: A great start
reviews.comment: Beautiful to look at but needs some customization options.  How about showing the country where the device is currently?
reviews.author: Rob A

reviews.title: Glitches found!
reviews.comment: I moove it to the left and   on the right its blocky squares. Great idea
reviews.author: Steven Sutler

reviews.title: Getting a little better
reviews.comment: It would be great to have the option to play the It\'s a Small World  melody.
reviews.author: Marla Braverman

reviews.title: Artistic, but...
reviews.comment: It got a little performance problem, especially while scrolling, and sometimes the background complexity made the screen feels cluttered
reviews.author: Tri Maryanto

reviews.title: Xperia s-works a dream!
reviews.comment: Installed despite other reviews, but we are heading to Disney soon ans this is my daughters favorite ride! I have all 5 pictures on each screen of my phone with each having something move about! Love it! Nice and bright!!
reviews.author: Lawrie Castaldo

reviews.title: Xperia Play,Disney FTW!
reviews.comment: The Live Wallpaper is great and beautiful. I bought because I need something different and awesome like this. But,the wallpaper needs and update to make him work in landscape mode,which isn\'t available in this version,I\'m waiting for this. Keep up the good work guys!
reviews.author: Luciano da Silva Hedler

reviews.title: Cute but drains battery
reviews.comment: I love this wallpaper. It\'s my favorite! But watch out for your battery.
reviews.author: Cassandra Markham
